9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Qudamah bin Abdullah said:"I saw the Prophet stoning the Jimar upon his she-camel; there was no hitting, nor crowding, nor: 'Look out! Look out

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ طَرْدِ النَّاسِ عِنْدَ رَمْىِ الْجِمَارِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked For The People To Crowd When Stoning The Jimar
